title: Emerine's Nightmare
description: What would you do if one night, life as you know it changes and you are left alone in despair? That is how Emerineâ€™s nightmare starts and now all he does is run.His family lived at the edge of the forest until dark shadows killed them all. Now they want him, and so does a magic tree. He has never seen dark shadows or enchanted trees before. Emerine has to get to the heart of Red Forest, to the fairy people. Only then he will be safe. Safe? He has never heard of fairies before and once he gets there what?
author: Anna del C. Dye
